articles.title: Australia held to 3-3 draw by Argentina
articles.description: Australia and Argentina had a tooth-to-tooth fight as both teams fought valiantly till the end. The Netherlands, on the contrary, decimated the Kiwis.
articles.content:

articles.title: Weather changes may be too late to salvage Argentina growing season
articles.description: Drought has lowered estimates for Argentina’s crops, but a change in the weather pattern may be on the horizon. Unfortunately, the shift in the weather pattern may be too little too late.
articles.content: No surprises in the weather for South America in the second full week of January 2023, week-ending January 14, as dryness continued for Argentina and southern Brazil. Farther north, beneficial precipitation fell, which has been the case most of this ... [2216 chars]

articles.title: Argentina’s inflation hit 31-year high at 94.8%
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES—Argentina registered inflation of 94.8 percent in 2022, its highest annual figure since 1991, the Indec national statistics institute said on Thursday.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES—Argentina registered inflation of 94.8 percent in 2022, its highest annual figure since 1991, the Indec national statistics institute said on Thursday.

articles.description: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery backed Emi Martinez after FIFA opened disciplinary proceedings against Argentina for their celebrations.
articles.content:
Aston Villa boss Unai Emery backed Emi Martinez after FIFA opened disciplinary proceedings against Argentina.
The world champions are in hot water following their celebrations after their final victory over France in Qatar.

articles.description: FIFA opened a disciplinary case against Argentina on Friday for the team's alleged misconduct and offensive behaviour at the Qatar World Cup final last month
articles.content:
FIFA opened a disciplinary case against Argentina on Friday for the team's alleged misconduct and offensive behaviour at the Qatar World Cup final last month.
